alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Elk (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 29 at 11:32PM CDT until March 30 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR ELK AND CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES... At 1131 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Grenola to 6 miles south of Moline to near Elgin, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sedan, Howard, Cedar Vale, Moline, Longton, Grenola, Peru, Chautauqua, Elk Falls, Elgin, Niotaze and Hale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
